Module com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis
Package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model.npc

Class Enemies

java.lang.Object
com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.model.npc.Enemies
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boo, Goomba, Spiny
public abstract class Enemies extends Object
This class represent an enemy in the game. This non-playable character has different features as life points and levels. It also possesses combat characteristics such as attack, defense and fighting points.
Author:
Christian Jesus Parra Cofre
